title: logitr
description: R package for fast estimation of multinomial and mixed logit models with preference space and willingness to pay space utility parameterizations.

title: surveydown
description: R package for generating markdown-based surveys using Quarto shiny documents.

title: Wireless Corne
description: Build log and gallery of how I built my wireless Corne keyboard.

title: The Distillery
description: Distill website showcasing other distill websites and blogs.

title: oica

title: magaScreener
description: Tool for analyzing documents for specific MAGA-targeted keywords, intended to be used to help identify words that might get screened by the federal government.

title: renderthis
description: R package for rendering slides and other media into different formats, including html, pdf, png, gif, pptx, and mp4.

title: charts

title: GW Coders
description: Study group that brings together students and faculty to apply computational and data analytics skills in research.

title: splitKbCompare
